name: Roy's Joy
description:
Roy found some pills on the floor while out on his joyful journey. Madness ensues.
Eat as many floor pills as you can to powerup and remove those pesky piggies getting in your way!

Controls:

  • Use WASD to move
  • Hold left click to shoot
  • R to restart the level

Best played in fullscreen with sound on!

This was made by a team of 3 in 3 hours for the Godot Rumble 0 game jam!
